isis.stitle: EC-17 ANTILOCK TRACTION CONTROLLER - OPERATION - TRACTION CONTROL - TORQUE LIMITING

svcproc.title: TORQUE LIMITING
svcproc.para: In order for the torque limiting control feature to be used, the vehicle must be equipped with an electronically controlled engine throttle. The torque limiting feature allows the EC-17 to reduce engine torque to a suitable level for the available traction. Torque limiting helps to minimize the amount (or speed) of wheel spin. It is especially useful in helping to minimizing a power jackknife and when all drive wheels are on an equally slippery surface.
